Name: Heal Scarf
LongDescription: Speeds up the Pokémon's natural HP healing. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Teddiursa and Ursaring.  You can get a Heal Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Teddi-Claw, a Teddi-Card, and a Honey Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
